summary: Traumatized by his experiences, a reclusive singer nurtures his pain until he meets a woman who really hears him.

reviews.content: A modern fable, sort of a Cinderella-story. Though slow paced, the scenery of southern Chile is remarkable, and though it seems that only one song is played, the way it's performed at various moments, especially at the finale, is remarkable. Jorge Garcia did an excellent job portraying the damaged protagonist who does get his last laugh.

Memo, with introverted feeling, is wonderful to watch. How emotions are portrayed without words. There are a few scenes that are a bit obvious, which lowered it for me, creating links that were already obvious (like showing the childhood passport to link the present day Memo to the child Memo), but I loved the quiet introversion of the film, a joy to watch.

Film with a slightly banal plot but still very valid and full of small twists that make it very watchable and entertaining. The film in general has a very nice moral of rendering, not beautiful, but still very valid and with positive implications.

Plot was too slow and really, what was so traumatic that he had to hid from the world?  Lots of people are mistreated as children and don't become a recluse.  I kept thinking it would get better since it had won an award, but nah.
The cinematography, message, plot, character development are great. Why haven't we heard more about this film.
Beautiful slow-paced poetry.  A hand crafted jewel in which the viewer can feel the makers love and dedication to their art.

I loved this movie.  The story shows how adults can hurt children and then children hurt each other, sometimes tragically. Also, the story unfolds gradually, everything seems so sleepy at the start, until you realize towards the end the emotions that rage inside. I loved the main character, his pain and his ability to overcome. There is a wonderfully satisfying feeling of justice being done at the end, and the song will mesmerize and haunt you for a long time.
Unexpectadly moving. Jorge's performance is outstanding in this gripping story.
Poignant and understated and heartbreaking!  A true gem.
The song is beautiful

This film encompasses all the key factors I look for in a film: quality camera work to capture the beauty of nature, music, lonliness or isolation due to past trauma, mental illness and other such causes, and revelation to break through prolonged seclusion, in particular, to find love.  

I love the way Memo is getting out of the studio door.
Excelente actuación de García.

Il film ha uno stile visivo e narrativo estremamente pesante e lento, ma nel finale soddisfa pienamente tutte le interessanti premesse che aveva costruito nella prima parte della pellicola. Resta quindi un film solido che nasconde una morale profonda, con un insegnamento per ogni tipo di spettatore assolutamente non trascurabile.

Slow burning movie with amazing texture and an engaging charactor taking place on a lake living with his uncle in a quite growing sheep. , sad life untill a girl deliveries good on day and finds her curious of why this mammoth, non talking ,dirty human refuses contact with the outside world. Great story to unveal . Clocks in just enough time to do the job without a dead spot.
Parece una buena trama, solo que esta atrapada en un comercial turístico de una hora de duración.

I loved the movie. The way the actor builds the character with so little dialogue and so much body language and emotional strength really makes you want to know more his personality. Landscape is breathtaking and the original song that is very well interpreted by the same actor is sticky. Totally recommended!

I have mixed feelings with this movie, in one side is good to see a story about someone that takes what it deserves after being taken it from him. But also the movie is very naive, somehow being part of what its trying to criticize.

I don't like that the lyrics of the song is so in your face about the theme of the movie.

Good film. A great story. The main character keeps trapped in the past and blends with fantasy his tedious days. A true that fights to come to surface keeps him going. Inspiring and warm. Stream it.

I'd guess that this movie is another reflection of Vargas Llosa's spectacle society effect where people can't tell anymore what's original to copy what's profound and shallow. A shallow simple movie with a non-problem fictious story that has affected zero people in human history, with a very poor soundtrack, a cinematography with few glimpeses of good shoots but most of the time just mediocre. The only thing good that one can say about this movie is that the acting of Jorge Garcia was well-done, not brilliant, but reasonable.
